enumeratedValues.name: SAMP_MODE_VON_BOTH
enumeratedValues.description: use Von Neumann data into both Entropy shifter and Statistical Checker

enumeratedValues.name: SAMP_MODE_RAW_BOTH
enumeratedValues.description: use raw data into both Entropy shifter and Statistical Checker

enumeratedValues.name: SAMP_MODE_VON_ENT
enumeratedValues.description: use Von Neumann data into Entropy shifter. Use raw data into Statistical Checker

enumeratedValues.name: SAMP_MODE_UNDEF
enumeratedValues.description: undefined/reserved.

enumeratedValues.name: OSC_DIV_DIV1
enumeratedValues.description: use ring oscillator with no divide

enumeratedValues.name: OSC_DIV_DIV2
enumeratedValues.description: use ring oscillator divided-by-2

enumeratedValues.name: OSC_DIV_DIV4
enumeratedValues.description: use ring oscillator divided-by-4

enumeratedValues.name: OSC_DIV_DIV8
enumeratedValues.description: use ring oscillator divided-by-8

UNUSED4.name: UNUSED4
UNUSED4.description: This bit is unused. Always reads zero.

UNUSED5.name: UNUSED5
UNUSED5.description: This bit is unused. Always reads zero.

FCT_VAL.name: FCT_VAL
FCT_VAL.description: Read only: Frequency Count Valid. Indicates that a valid frequency count may be read from FRQCNT.

TST_OUT.name: TST_OUT
TST_OUT.description: Read only: Test point inside ring oscillator.

LRUN_CONT.name: LRUN_CONT
LRUN_CONT.description: Long run count continues between entropy generations

SCR1C.description: Statistical Check Run Length 1 Count Register

SCR2L.description: Statistical Check Run Length 2 Limit Register

TF1BR0.name: TF1BR0
TF1BR0.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF1BR0=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF1BR1.name: TF1BR1
TF1BR1.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF1BR1=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF2BR0.name: TF2BR0
TF2BR0.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF2BR0=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF2BR1.name: TF2BR1
TF2BR1.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF2BR1=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF3BR0.name: TF3BR0
TF3BR0.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF3BR0=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF3BR1.name: TF3BR1
TF3BR1.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF3BR1=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF4BR0.name: TF4BR0
TF4BR0.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF4BR0=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF4BR1.name: TF4BR1
TF4BR1.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF4BR1=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF5BR0.name: TF5BR0
TF5BR0.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF5BR0=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF5BR1.name: TF5BR1
TF5BR1.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF5BR1=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF6PBR0.name: TF6PBR0
TF6PBR0.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 0s

TF6PBR1.name: TF6PBR1
TF6PBR1.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 1s

TFSB.name: TFSB
TFSB.description: Test Fail, Sparse Bit. If TFSB=1, the Sparse Bit Test has failed.

TFLR.name: TFLR
TFLR.description: Test Fail, Long Run. If TFLR=1, the Long Run Test has failed.

TFP.name: TFP
TFP.description: Test Fail, Poker. If TFP=1, the Poker Test has failed.

TFMB.name: TFMB
TFMB.description: Test Fail, Mono Bit. If TFMB=1, the Mono Bit Test has failed.

PKRCNT10.name: PKRCNT10
PKRCNT10.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 1 and 0 Register

PKRCNT32.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 3 and 2 Register

PKRCNT54.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 5 and 4 Register

PKRCNT76.name: PKRCNT76
PKRCNT76.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 7 and 6 Register

PKRCNT98.name: PKRCNT98
PKRCNT98.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 9 and 8 Register

PKRCNTBA.name: PKRCNTBA
PKRCNTBA.description: Statistical Check Poker Count B and A Register

PKRCNTDC.name: PKRCNTDC
PKRCNTDC.description: Statistical Check Poker Count D and C Register

PKRCNTFE.name: PKRCNTFE
PKRCNTFE.description: Statistical Check Poker Count F and E Register

NO_PRGM.name: NO_PRGM
NO_PRGM.description: If set, the TRNG registers cannot be programmed

enumeratedValues.name: NO_PRGM_OFF
enumeratedValues.description: Programability of registers controlled only by the Miscellaneous Control Register's access mode bit.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_PRGM_ON
enumeratedValues.description: Overides Miscellaneous Control Register access mode and prevents TRNG register programming.

HW_ERR.name: HW_ERR
HW_ERR.description: Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS register has been asserted.

enumeratedValues.name: HW_ERR_CLEAR
enumeratedValues.description: Corresponding bit of INT_STATUS register cleared.

enumeratedValues.name: HW_ERR_ON
enumeratedValues.description: Corresponding bit of INT_STATUS register active.

ENT_VAL.name: ENT_VAL
ENT_VAL.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: ENT_VAL_CLEAR
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: ENT_VAL_ON
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

FRQ_CT_FAIL.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL
FRQ_CT_FAIL.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL_CLEAR
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL_ON
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

HW_ERR.name: HW_ERR
HW_ERR.description: Bit position that can be cleared or set to enable the corresponding bit of INT_STATUS to show interupt status

enumeratedValues.name: HW_ERR_MASKED
enumeratedValues.description: Corresponding interrupt of INT_STATUS is masked.

enumeratedValues.name: HW_ERR_ACTIVE
enumeratedValues.description: Corresponding bit of INT_STATUS is active.

ENT_VAL.name: ENT_VAL
ENT_VAL.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: ENT_VAL_MASKED
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: ENT_VAL_ACTIVE
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

FRQ_CT_FAIL.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL
FRQ_CT_FAIL.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL_MASKED
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL_ACTIVE
enumeratedValues.description: Same behavior as bit 0 of this register.

enumeratedValues.name: HW_ERR_NO
enumeratedValues.description: no error

enumeratedValues.name: HW_ERR_YES
enumeratedValues.description: error detected.

enumeratedValues.name: ENT_VAL_INVALID
enumeratedValues.description: Busy generation entropy. Any value read is invalid.

enumeratedValues.name: ENT_VAL_VALID
enumeratedValues.description: TRNG can be stopped and entropy is valid if read.

enumeratedValues.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL_NO_ERR
enumeratedValues.description: No hardware nor self test frequency errors.

enumeratedValues.name: FRQ_CT_FAIL_ERR
enumeratedValues.description: The frequency counter has detected a failure.

MIN_REV.name: MIN_REV
MIN_REV.description: Shows the IP's Minor revision of the TRNG.

enumeratedValues.name: MIN_REV_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: Minor revision number for TRNG.

MAJ_REV.name: MAJ_REV
MAJ_REV.description: Shows the IP's Major revision of the TRNG.

enumeratedValues.name: MAJ_REV_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: Major revision number for TRNG.

enumeratedValues.name: IP_ID_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: ID for TRNG.

CONFIG_OPT.name: CONFIG_OPT
CONFIG_OPT.description: Shows the IP's Configuaration options for the TRNG.

enumeratedValues.name: CONFIG_OPT_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: TRNG_CONFIG_OPT for TRNG.

ECO_REV.name: ECO_REV
ECO_REV.description: Shows the IP's ECO revision of the TRNG.

enumeratedValues.name: ECO_REV_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: TRNG_ECO_REV for TRNG.

INTG_OPT.name: INTG_OPT
INTG_OPT.description: Shows the integration options for the TRNG

enumeratedValues.name: INTG_OPT_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: INTG_OPT for TRNG.

ERA.name: ERA
ERA.description: Shows the compile options for the TRNG.

enumeratedValues.name: ERA_VAL
enumeratedValues.description: COMPILE_OPT for TRNG.
